author: @martam8395
comment:
We are devastated by the passing of our dear friend Matthew Perry.

Matthew was an incredibly gifted actor and an indelible part of the WB TV Group family.

The impact of his comedic genius was felt around the world, and his legacy will live on in the hearts of so many.

This is a heartbreaking day, and we send our love to his family, his loved ones, and all of his devoted fans.

________________________________________

We are all so utterly devastated by the loss of Matthew. We were more than just cast mates. We are a family,

There is so much to say, but right now we‚Äôre going to take a moment to grieve and process this unfathomable loss.

‚ÄùIn time we will say more, as and when we are able‚Äù

 For now, our thoughts and our love are with Matty‚Äôs family, his friends, and everyone who loved him around the world.

The message is then signed by Aniston, Cox, Kudrow, LeBlanc and Schwimmer

I was volunteering in a woman‚Äôs center for addiction, this girl told me crying ‚ÄúHow I wish I never tried it‚Äù

People should be horrified terrified of drugs, talk to kids about it, show them what addiction does to a human.

Honestly think he just got physically worked up that day playing pickleball and then hit that hot tub to relax but it drives up the blood pressure and body temperature. author: @adamwanly6025
comment:
Matthew Perry‚Äòs Chandler Bing ‚Äî the most sarcastic of the ‚ÄúFriends‚Äù sextet ‚Äî is the No. 1 favorite character of the sitcom‚Äôs fans, according to votes on ranking site Ranker.

Based on 169,000 total votes, Bing tops the list of the best characters on ‚ÄúFriends,‚Äù per Ranker. He‚Äôs followed by Joey Tribbiani (played by Matt LeBlanc); Rachel Green (Jennifer Aniston); Phoebe Buffay (Lisa Kudrow); Ross Gellar (David Schwimmer); and Monica Gellar (Courteney Cox).

Chandler Bing also is considered the second funniest TV character ever, according to another Ranker poll, coming in second only to Steve Carell‚Äôs Michael Scott from ‚ÄúThe Office.‚Äù In addition, Bing tops Ranker‚Äôs lists of ‚ÄúUnexpected TV Couples No One Predicted‚Äù (Monica and Chandler) and ‚ÄúThe Best TV Characters of the 1990s.‚Äù

Perry died on Saturday, Oct. 28, at his home in Los Angeles. He was 54.
